name: Steamed Apple - Instant Pot
recipe:
Wash the apples and cut them into slices, removing the stem and seeds.
Place apple slices into the instant pot bassinet.
Add a few glasses of water to instant pot.
Place the bassinet into instant pot
Set instant pot to sealing and steamed for 5 mins.

name: Jacket Potato - Instant Pot
recipe:
Wash and poke a few potatoes and add to instant pot
Add water to instant pot
Set to steam for 22 minutes
Set instant pot to sealing
